analysis.description:
MainBattle.createGladiatorBattle (/unique_chucks/2/0x68ed06af5989e05bc4aa510b44dc6d003e225187.sol#517-527) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-gladiatorBattle.create(msg.sender,_dragonId,_tactics,_isGold,_bet,_counter,msg.value) (/unique_chucks/2/0x68ed06af5989e05bc4aa510b44dc6d003e225187.sol#524-527)

MainBattle.autoSelectOpponentForGladiatorBattle (/unique_chucks/2/0x68ed06af5989e05bc4aa510b44dc6d003e225187.sol#547-557) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-gladiatorBattle.autoSelectOpponent(_battleId,_applicantsHash) (/unique_chucks/2/0x68ed06af5989e05bc4aa510b44dc6d003e225187.sol#556-557)

MainBattle.addTimeForOpponentSelectForGladiatorBattle (/unique_chucks/2/0x68ed06af5989e05bc4aa510b44dc6d003e225187.sol#615-620) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-gladiatorBattle.addTimeForOpponentSelect(msg.sender,_battleId) (/unique_chucks/2/0x68ed06af5989e05bc4aa510b44dc6d003e225187.sol#618-619)

MainBattle.updateBlockNumberOfGladiatorBattle (/unique_chucks/2/0x68ed06af5989e05bc4aa510b44dc6d003e225187.sol#620-625) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-gladiatorBattle.updateBattleBlockNumber(_battleId) (/unique_chucks/2/0x68ed06af5989e05bc4aa510b44dc6d003e225187.sol#624)

MainBattle.placeSpectatorBetOnGladiatorBattle (/unique_chucks/2/0x68ed06af5989e05bc4aa510b44dc6d003e225187.sol#625-635) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-gladiatorBattleSpectators.placeBet(msg.sender,_battleId,_willCreatorWin,_value,msg.value) (/unique_chucks/2/0x68ed06af5989e05bc4aa510b44dc6d003e225187.sol#633-635)

MainBattle.requestSpectatorRewardForGladiatorBattle (/unique_chucks/2/0x68ed06af5989e05bc4aa510b44dc6d003e225187.sol#639-641) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-gladiatorBattleSpectators.requestReward(msg.sender,_battleId) (/unique_chucks/2/0x68ed06af5989e05bc4aa510b44dc6d003e225187.sol)
GladiatorBattle.apply (function @ /unique_chucks/2/0x68ed06af5989e05bc4aa510b44dc6d003e225187.sol#149) shadows built-in symbol "apply"
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/2/0x68ed06af5989e05bc4aa510b44dc6d003e225187.sol#21-29) should be declared external
Pausable.pause (/unique_chucks/2/0x68ed06af5989e05bc4aa510b44dc6d003e225187.sol#45-50) should be declared external
